alert.note: Alert for Bristol (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 8:26PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Norfolk, southern Suffolk, Plymouth, northeastern Bristol and east central Bristol Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 825 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Easton, or near Brockton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Boston, Brockton, Quincy, Fall River, Brookline, Plymouth, Taunton, Weymouth, Braintree, Randolph, Needham, Norwood, Milton, Stoughton, Bridgewater, Marshfield, Bristol, Attleboro, Dedham, and Walpole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
